thread.title: Harry Styles from One Direction suffers epic onstage fall |
thread.title_full: Harry Styles from One Direction suffers epic onstage fall | dailytelegraph.com.au

author: Network Writers
title: Harry Styles from One Direction suffers epic onstage fall |
text:
IT wasn’t quite as epic as Madonna’s fall but One Direction’s Harry Styles has left fans laughing after he took a tumble live on stage.
While performing in San Diego, Styles appeared to get caught by the microphone stand pulling him backwards and off his feet.
I'M LAUGHING SO HARD OMG😂 #OhNoHarry https://t.co/VXtIQuOYT6
— zaynmalik1D (@ZaynsCore) July 10, 2015
Bandmate Liam Payne asked Styles if he was aright to which he responded saying, “Physically I’m fine, emotionally I’m bruised.”
Niall Horan comment, “I know exactly how it feels,” after his infamous fall at the Masters Tournament, where a reporter exclaimed, “Oh no, Niall!”
Fits of laughter ... Louis Tomlinson, Liam Payne, Niall Horan, and Harry Styles of One Direction. Picture: Getty Source: Getty Images
Sure enough “Oh no, Harry” became the biggest trending item on Twitter after the fall, with thousands sharing the video.
It wasn’t quite as spectacular as Madonna’s fall at the BRIT Awards but it did get the internet chattering.
😩😩😩😩 Im sorry but that actually nearly killed me just then!! #Madonna #BRITAwards https://t.co/c0Nosdi11e ”
— Donovan Miller (@Doncricket2004) February 25, 2015 Originally published as Styles suffers epic onstage fall
